raw_text: GOONESEKERA,​ ANNETTE – Dearly beloved wife of late Cecil Goonesekera,​ loving mother of Aindra & Sharmini,​ late Chris,​ Mirani & John (Rajpal) Wickremeratne,​ much loved grandmother of Shehan & Menaka,​ Rehan & Divya,​ great grandmother of Siaana & Kylan,​ beloved sister of late Bertie Silva,​ Helene Cabraal,​ late Vivian Perera,​ late Eugenie Ameresekere,​ late Roland Silva,​ Leela Rodrigo & Yvonne Abhayaratne. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on Friday,​ 28th July from 9.00 a.m. onwards. Cortege leaves Parlour at 3.30 p.m. on Friday 28th July for Cremation at 4.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Old Crematorium). No flowers by request.046114
